author: Simon Difford
description: Freshly pressed pomegranate juice is essential to the success of this deliciously fruity but dry Daiquiri. Sadly, packaged juice doesn't produce the same drink.
name: Pomegranate Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
